price: Allah’ın gökten su indirmesiyle yeryüzünün yemyeşil olduğunu görmüyor musun? Allah, Latif'tir, Habirdir.
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَتُصۡبِحُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مُخۡضَرَّةًۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَطِيفٌ خَبِيرٞ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam tara anna al-laha anzala mina al-samāi māan fatuṣ'biḥu al-arḍu mukh'ḍarratan inna al-laha laṭīfun khabīrun
